meta.title: YoSiDi CAD - CAD Drawing App for iPad and iPhone
meta.description: YoSiDi CAD is a professional CAD drawing application for iPad and iPhone, specialized in quick and efficient surveying of existing spaces and buildings.
meta.og_title: YoSiDi CAD - CAD Drawing App for iPad and iPhone
meta.og_description: Professional CAD application for surveying spaces and buildings. Essential tools, area calculation, and more.
meta.twitter_title: YoSiDi CAD - CAD Drawing App for iPad and iPhone
meta.twitter_description: Professional CAD application for surveying spaces and buildings. Essential tools, area calculation, and more.

hero.title: Draw professional plans on your iPad
hero.subtitle: YoSiDi CAD is the ultimate app for surveying existing spaces and buildings quickly and efficiently.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Professional tools designed for architects and design professionals

tools.title: Essential Tools
tools.description: Parallel, fillet, trim, extend, copy, move, rotate, and stretch. Everything you need for professional technical drawing.

areas.title: Automatic Area Calculation
areas.description: Automatically calculate areas of your spaces and add labels with a single click.

openings.title: Smart Openings
openings.description: Place parametric doors and windows with a single click. Fully configurable.

blocks.title: Block Library
blocks.description: Quick insertion of typical blocks: furniture, fixtures, architectural elements, and more.

formats.title: Professional Formats
formats.description: Standard drawing formats with configurable title block for professional presentations.

units.title: Metric and Imperial Systems
units.description: Work with your preferred units. Full support for both measurement systems.

gallery.title: Screenshots
gallery.subtitle: Discover YoSiDi CAD's intuitive and professional interface

download.title: Download YoSiDi CAD Today
download.subtitle: Available for iPad and iPhone. Start creating professional plans in minutes.

footer.tagline: Professional CAD drawing on your iOS device
